explains: n. 投机，投机买卖；猜测，推测，推断
wordGroup: speculation about n. 关于…猜测

sentences.en: I am tired of all the speculation.
sentences.cn: 我厌烦了所有这些猜测。

sentences.en: Speculation is rife that he will be fired.
sentences.cn: 他将被解雇的猜测盛行。

sentences.en: Speculation about a divorce proved totally unfounded.
sentences.cn: 有关离婚的猜测证实纯属无稽之谈。
